issue.title: Sparse Scenary in proposed qualifier and VRC scenes

content.raw:
Nate,
I've spent quite a bit of time creating some worlds with a useful amount of texture and added them to the forum:
https://www.theroboticschallenge.org/forum/default.aspx?Function_fst=ViewThread&ThreadID_fin=142

Could you please consider creating worlds that resemble this for the VRC and Quals. Tarball of worlds and models:
 https://www.dropbox.com/s/hqhrpb1zany644k/walking_world_example.tar.gz

Vision navigation algorithms cannot work without such scenery.
content.html:
